column1: (1) To issue shares of Republic common stock and other securities convertible into or exercisable for shares of Republic common stock, contemplated by the Agreement and Plan of Merger, dated as of June 22, 2008, as amended July 31, 2008, among Republic, RS Merger Wedge, Inc,, a wholly owned subsidiary of Republic, formed for the purpose of the merger, and Allied Waste Industries, Inc.
(2) To adjourn the Special Meeting, if necessary, to solicit additional proxies in favor of the foregoing proposal
